testcase.name: User searches for and selects a product - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in on Flipkart with username and password.........passed When the user searches for product "iPhone 12"..............................passed And selects the first product from the search results.......................passed Then the user should be on the product details page for "iPhone 12".........passed

testcase.name: User searches for and selects a product - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in on Flipkart with username and password.........passed When the user searches for product "Samsung Galaxy".........................passed And selects the first product from the search results.......................passed Then the user should be on the product details page for "Samsung Galaxy"....passed
